item.name: 2.5 get Users with their userSubscribedTo + Profile
2.6 get User(id) with his subscribedToUser (followers) + Posts
2.7 get Users with their userSubscribedTo + subscribedToUser

graphql.query:
mutation (
    $userId: ID!,
    $avatar: String!,
    $sex: String!,
    $birthday: Int!,
    $country: String!, 
    $street: String!,
    $city: String!,
    $memberTypeId: String!,
) {
    createProfile(data: {
        userId: $userId,
        avatar: $avatar,
        sex: $sex,
        birthday: $birthday,
        country: $country,
        street: $street,
        city: $city,
        memberTypeId: $memberTypeId,
    }) 
    {
        id
    }
}

mutation (
    $id: ID!,
    $avatar: String!,
    $sex: String!,
    $birthday: Int!,
    $country: String!, 
    $street: String!,
    $city: String!,
    $memberTypeId: String!,
) {
    updateProfile(data: {
        id: $id,
        avatar: $avatar,
        sex: $sex,
        birthday: $birthday,
        country: $country,
        street: $street,
        city: $city,
        memberTypeId: $memberTypeId,
    }) 
    {
        id
    }
}
